casebody.data:
Eria DOSS, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 81454 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: July 16, 2019 Steven Willibey, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Karen Kramer, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: Lisa White Hardwick, Presiding Judge, Thomas H. Newton, and Mark D. Pfeiffer, Judges

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Eria Doss appeals a Jackson County Circuit Court judgment denying his amended Rule 29.15 motion following a hearing. He is currently serving an aggregate 79-year term of imprisonment. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
